function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation rates in high-occupancy buildings leading to increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease outbreaks and spread of airborne viruses in buildings","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates and adopt technologies to improve air quality (e.g., HEPA filters, UV-C air purifiers)","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV-C air purifiers, increased ventilation rates","People":"Occupants of high-occupancy buildings (e.g., school classrooms, gyms, restaurants, care facilities, hotels)","Owner":"Building managers, facility operators, government regulators"},{"Description":"Adverse outcomes of increasing ventilation rate, including indoor discomfort, higher energy consumption, and increased CO2 emissions","Impact":"Reduced indoor comfort, increased energy costs, and environmental impact","Mitigation":"Implement measures to minimize draught and noise levels, optimize energy consumption, and reduce CO2 emissions","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, energy-efficient HVAC systems, soundproofing materials","People":"Building occupants, environmental and energy consultants","Owner":"Building managers, environmental consultants, energy management professionals"}]}
